name: Aether
description: Kineticists who focus on the element of aether-a rare substance formed when elemental energy affects the Ethereal Plane-are called telekineticists. Telekineticists use strands of aether to move objects with their minds.
**Class Skills:** A telekineticist adds Knowledge (engineering) and Sleight of Hand to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Telekinetic Blast](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Blast)
**Composite Blasts** - [Aetheric Boost](kinetic-talent:Aetheric Boost), [Force Blast](kinetic-talent:Force Blast)
**Defense** - [Force Ward](kinetic-talent:Force Ward)

**1st** - [Basic Telekinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Telekinesis), [Kinetic Cover](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Cover), [Kinetic Healer](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Healer), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion), [Telekinetic Boomerang](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Boomerang), [Telekinetic Finesse](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Finesse)
**2nd** - [Angelic Protection](kinetic-talent:Angelic Protection), [Bowling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Bowling Infusion), [Telekinetic Haul](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Haul)

**3rd** - [Foe Throw](kinetic-talent:Foe Throw), [Force Hook](kinetic-talent:Force Hook), [Primal Aether](kinetic-talent:Primal Aether), [Self Telekinesis](kinetic-talent:Self Telekinesis), [Telekinetic Invisibility](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Invisibility), [Touchsight](kinetic-talent:Touchsight)
**4th** - [Healing Burst](kinetic-talent:Healing Burst), [Spying Touchsight](kinetic-talent:Spying Touchsight), [Telekinetic Maneuvers](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Maneuvers)
**5th** - [Self Telekinesis, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Self Telekinesis), [Touchsight, Reactive](kinetic-talent:Reactive Touchsight)
**6th** - [Disintegrating Infusion](kinetic-talent:Disintegrating Infusion), [Kinetic Revivification](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Revivification), [Suffocate](kinetic-talent:Suffocate)
**7th** - [Spell Deflection](kinetic-talent:Spell Deflection)
**8th** - [Many Throw](kinetic-talent:Many Throw), [Telekinetic Deflection](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Deflection), [Telekinetic Globe](kinetic-talent:Telekinetic Globe)
**9th** - [Aether Architect](kinetic-talent:Aether Architect)

name: Air
description: Kineticists who focus on the element of air are called aerokineticists. Aerokineticists often control air flow or electricity, specializing in mobility and ranged combat.
**Class Skills:** An aerokineticist adds Fly and Knowledge (nature) to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Air Blast](kinetic-talent:Air Blast), [Electric Blast](kinetic-talent:Electric Blast)

**Composite Blasts** - [Blizzard Blast](kinetic-talent:Blizzard Blast), [Charged Water Blast](kinetic-talent:Charged Water Blast), [Plasma Blast](kinetic-talent:Plasma Blast), [Sandstorm Blast](kinetic-talent:Sandstorm Blast), [Spring Blast](kinetic-talent:Spring Blast), [Thunderstorm Blast](kinetic-talent:Thunderstorm Blast)
**Defense** - [Enveloping Winds](kinetic-talent:Enveloping Winds)

**1st** - [Aerial Adaptation](kinetic-talent:Aerial Adaptation), [Air Cushion](kinetic-talent:Air Cushion), [Air Shroud](kinetic-talent:Air Shroud), [Air's Leap](kinetic-talent:Air's Leap), [Air's Reach](kinetic-talent:Air's Reach), [Basic Aerokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Aerokinesis), [Energize Weapon](kinetic-talent:Energize Weapon), [Gusting Infusion](kinetic-talent:Gusting Infusion), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion), [Thundering Infusion](kinetic-talent:Thundering Infusion), [Voice of the Wind](kinetic-talent:Voice of the Wind)
**2nd** - [Voice of the Wind, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Voice of the Wind)

**3rd** - [Aerial Evasion](kinetic-talent:Aerial Evasion), [Bolt](kinetic-talent:Bolt), [Celerity](kinetic-talent:Celerity), [Engulfing Winds](kinetic-talent:Engulfing Winds), [Magnetic Infusion](kinetic-talent:Magnetic Infusion), [Magnetism](kinetic-talent:Magnetism), [Synaptic Infusion](kinetic-talent:Synaptic Infusion), [Torrent](kinetic-talent:Torrent), [Windsight](kinetic-talent:Windsight), [Wings of Air](kinetic-talent:Wings of Air)
**4th** - [Body of Air](kinetic-talent:Body of Air), [Cyclone](kinetic-talent:Cyclone)
**5th** - [Air Shroud, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Air Shroud), [Windsight, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Windsight)
**6th** - [Suffocate](kinetic-talent:Suffocate), [Wind Manipulator](kinetic-talent:Wind Manipulator)
**7th** - [Cloud](kinetic-talent:Cloud), [Sky Walk](kinetic-talent:Sky Walk)
**8th** - [Weather Master](kinetic-talent:Weather Master)
**9th** - [Magnetism, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Magnetism)

name: Earth
description: Kineticists who focus on the element of earth are called geokineticists. Geokineticists manipulate the earth itself, and they are masters of defensive techniques.
**Class Skills:** A geokineticist adds Climb and Knowledge (dungeoneering) to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Earth Blast](kinetic-talent:Earth Blast)

**Composite Blasts** - [Autumn Blast](kinetic-talent:Autumn Blast), [Magma Blast](kinetic-talent:Magma Blast), [Metal Blast](kinetic-talent:Metal Blast), [Mud Blast](kinetic-talent:Mud Blast), [Sandstorm Blast](kinetic-talent:Sandstorm Blast)
**Defense** - [Flesh of Stone](kinetic-talent:Flesh of Stone)

**1st** - [Basic Geokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Geokinesis), [Earth Walk](kinetic-talent:Earth Walk), [Kinetic Cover](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Cover), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion)
**2nd** - [Bowling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Bowling Infusion), [Earth Climb](kinetic-talent:Earth Climb), [Entangling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Entangling Infusion)

**3rd** - [Clockwork Heart](kinetic-talent:Clockwork Heart), [Earth Child](kinetic-talent:Earth Child), [Impale](kinetic-talent:Impale), [Jagged Flesh](kinetic-talent:Jagged Flesh), [Magnetic Infusion](kinetic-talent:Magnetic Infusion), [Magnetism](kinetic-talent:Magnetism), [Pillar](kinetic-talent:Pillar), [Rare-metal Infusion](kinetic-talent:Rare-metal Infusion), [Tremorsense](kinetic-talent:Tremorsense)
**4th** - [Earthmeld](kinetic-talent:Earthmeld), [Enduring Earth](kinetic-talent:Enduring Earth), [Shift Earth](kinetic-talent:Shift Earth)
**5th** - [Tremorsense, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Tremorsense), [Untwisting Iron Infusion](kinetic-talent:Untwisting Iron Infusion)
**6th** - [Deadly Earth](kinetic-talent:Deadly Earth)
**7th** - [Shift Earth, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Shift Earth)
**8th** - [Earth Tongue](kinetic-talent:Earth Tongue)
**9th** - [Magnetism, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Magnetism), [Seismic Master](kinetic-talent:Seismic Master)

name: Fire
description: Kineticists who focus on the element of fire are called pyrokineticists. Pyrokineticists wield elemental fire as a potent weapon, and they possess a powerful offense.
**Class Skills:** A pyrokineticist adds Escape Artist and Knowledge (nature) to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Fire Blast](kinetic-talent:Fire Blast)

**Composite Blasts** - [Blue Flame Blast](kinetic-talent:Blue Flame Blast), [Magma Blast](kinetic-talent:Magma Blast), [Plasma Blast](kinetic-talent:Plasma Blast), [Steam Blast](kinetic-talent:Steam Blast), [Summer Blast](kinetic-talent:Summer Blast)
**Defense** - [Searing Flesh](kinetic-talent:Searing Flesh)

**1st** - [Basic Pyrokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Pyrokinesis), [Burning Infusion](kinetic-talent:Burning Infusion), [Cold Adaptation](kinetic-talent:Cold Adaptation), [Dazzling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Dazzling Infusion), [Energize Weapon](kinetic-talent:Energize Weapon), [Fan of Flames](kinetic-talent:Fan of Flames), [Fire Sculptor](kinetic-talent:Fire Sculptor), [Fire's Fury](kinetic-talent:Fire's Fury), [Heat Adaptation](kinetic-talent:Heat Adaptation)

**2nd** - [Fire Steed](kinetic-talent:Fire Steed), [Flame Trap](kinetic-talent:Flame Trap), [Foxfire](kinetic-talent:Foxfire), [Penetrating Infusion](kinetic-talent:Penetrating Infusion), [Searing Flame](kinetic-talent:Searing Flame)

**3rd** - [Eruption](kinetic-talent:Eruption), [Firesight](kinetic-talent:Firesight), [Flame Jet](kinetic-talent:Flame Jet), [Foxfire Infusion](kinetic-talent:Foxfire Infusion), [Heat Wave](kinetic-talent:Heat Wave), [Smoke Storm](kinetic-talent:Smoke Storm), [Torrent](kinetic-talent:Torrent)
**4th** - [Detonation](kinetic-talent:Detonation), [Flash Infusion](kinetic-talent:Flash Infusion), [Purifying Flames](kinetic-talent:Purifying Flames)

**5th** - [Flame Jet, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Flame Jet), [Flame Shield](kinetic-talent:Flame Shield), [Improved Fire Steed](kinetic-talent:Improved Fire Steed), [Trail of Flames](kinetic-talent:Trail of Flames), [Unblinking Flame Infusion](kinetic-talent:Unblinking Flame Infusion), [Unraveling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Unraveling Infusion)
**6th** - [Brilliant Infusion](kinetic-talent:Brilliant Infusion), [Purging Flame](kinetic-talent:Purging Flame)
**7th** - [Explosion](kinetic-talent:Explosion), [Pure-flame Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pure-flame Infusion)
**8th** - [Greater Fire Steed](kinetic-talent:Greater Fire Steed)
**9th** - [From the Ashes](kinetic-talent:From the Ashes)

name: Universal
description: The following wild talents are available to all kineticists.
**Class Skills:** N/A
**Simple Blasts** - N/A
**Composite Blasts** - N/A
**Defense** - N/A

**1st** - [Draining Infusion](kinetic-talent:Draining Infusion), [Elemental Whispers](kinetic-talent:Elemental Whispers), [Extended Range](kinetic-talent:Extended Range), [Infernal Bargain](kinetic-talent:Infernal Bargain), [Kinetic Awe](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Awe), [Kinetic Blade](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Blade), [Kinetic Dissolution](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Dissolution), [Kinetic Fist](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Fist), [Mesmerizing Elementalist](kinetic-talent:Mesmerizing Elementalist), [Nine-Tailed Kineticist](kinetic-talent:Nine Tailed Kineticist), [Skilled Kineticist](kinetic-talent:Skilled Kineticist), [Tengu Blade Lore](kinetic-talent:Tengu Blade Lore), [Venom Speaker](kinetic-talent:Venom Speaker)
**2nd** - [Skilled Kineticist, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Skilled Kineticist), [Spindle](kinetic-talent:Spindle), [Venom Admixture](kinetic-talent:Venom Admixture)

**3rd** - [Elemental Whispers, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Elemental Whispers), [Extreme Range](kinetic-talent:Extreme Range), [Flurry of Blasts](kinetic-talent:Flurry of Blasts), [Kinetic Restoration](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Restoration), [Kinetic Whip](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Whip), [Mobile Blast](kinetic-talent:Mobile Blast), [Snake](kinetic-talent:Snake), [Stylish Infusion](kinetic-talent:Stylish Infusion)
**4th** - [Expanded Defense](kinetic-talent:Expanded Defense), [Venom Infusion](kinetic-talent:Venom Infusion)

**5th** - [Blade Whirlwind](kinetic-talent:Blade Whirlwind), [Grappling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Grappling Infusion), [Kinetic Form](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Form), [Spark of Life](kinetic-talent:Spark of Life), [Wall](kinetic-talent:Wall)
**6th** - [Ride the Blast](kinetic-talent:Ride the Blast), [Whip Hurricane](kinetic-talent:Whip Hurricane)
**7th** - [Venom Infusion, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Venom Infusion)
**8th** - [Elemental Exile](kinetic-talent:Elemental Exile), [Reverse Shift](kinetic-talent:Reverse Shift)

name: Void
description: Like aether, void forms where elemental energy meets another material, in this case the substance of the Negative Energy Plane. Chaokineticists command this strange force in a way that in some respects resembles the manipulation of aether.
**Class Skills:** A chaokineticist adds Knowledge (dungeoneering) and Escape Artist to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Gravity Blast](kinetic-talent:Gravity Blast), [Negative Blast](kinetic-talent:Negative Blast)
**Composite Blasts** - [Gravitic Boost](kinetic-talent:Gravitic Boost), [Negative Admixture](kinetic-talent:Negative Admixture), [Void Blast](kinetic-talent:Void Blast)
**Defense** - [Emptiness](kinetic-talent:Emptiness)

**1st** - [Basic Chaokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Chaokinesis), [Dampening Infusion](kinetic-talent:Dampening Infusion), [Energize Weapon](kinetic-talent:Energize Weapon), [Pulling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pulling Infusion), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion), [Void Healer](kinetic-talent:Void Healer)
**2nd** - [Eyes of the Void](kinetic-talent:Eyes of the Void), [No Breath](kinetic-talent:No Breath), [Weighing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Weighing Infusion)

**3rd** - [Darkness Infusion](kinetic-talent:Darkness Infusion), [Gravity Control](kinetic-talent:Gravity Control), [Undead Grip](kinetic-talent:Undead Grip), [Unnerving Infusion](kinetic-talent:Unnerving Infusion)

**4th** - [Absentia](kinetic-talent:Absentia), [Corpse Puppet](kinetic-talent:Corpse Puppet), [Curse Breaker](kinetic-talent:Curse Breaker), [Healing Burst](kinetic-talent:Healing Burst), [Singularity](kinetic-talent:Singularity), [Turning Blast](kinetic-talent:Turning Blast)

**5th** - [Eyes of the Void, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Eyes of the Void), [Gravity Control, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Gravity Control), [Vampiric Infusion](kinetic-talent:Vampiric Infusion)
**6th** - [Darkness Infusion, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Darkness Infusion), [Suffocate](kinetic-talent:Suffocate)
**7th** - [Enervating Infusion](kinetic-talent:Enervating Infusion)
**9th** - [Gravity Master](kinetic-talent:Gravity Master)

name: Water
description: Kineticists who focus on the element of water are called hydrokineticists. Hydrokineticists master the flow of water or the numbing chill of cold, and they are known for their versatility and flowing forms, like the ever-changing currents.
**Class Skills:** A hydrokineticist adds Knowledge (nature) and Swim to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Cold Blast](kinetic-talent:Cold Blast), [Water Blast](kinetic-talent:Water Blast)

**Composite Blasts** - [Blizzard Blast](kinetic-talent:Blizzard Blast), [Charged Water Blast](kinetic-talent:Charged Water Blast), [Ice Blast](kinetic-talent:Ice Blast), [Mud Blast](kinetic-talent:Mud Blast), [Steam Blast](kinetic-talent:Steam Blast), [Winter Blast](kinetic-talent:Winter Blast)
**Defense** - [Shroud of Water](kinetic-talent:Shroud of Water)

**1st** - [Basic Hydrokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Hydrokinesis), [Cold Adaptation](kinetic-talent:Cold Adaptation), [Energize Weapon](kinetic-talent:Energize Weapon), [Heat Adaptation](kinetic-talent:Heat Adaptation), [Icewalker](kinetic-talent:Icewalker), [Kinetic Cover](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Cover), [Kinetic Healer](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Healer), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion), [Quenching Infusion](kinetic-talent:Quenching Infusion), [Slick](kinetic-talent:Slick), [Water Alteration](kinetic-talent:Water Alteration)

**2nd** - [Angelic Protection](kinetic-talent:Angelic Protection), [Entangling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Entangling Infusion), [Penetrating Infusion](kinetic-talent:Penetrating Infusion), [Slick Infusion](kinetic-talent:Slick Infusion), [Veil of Mists](kinetic-talent:Veil of Mists)

**3rd** - [Cold Snap](kinetic-talent:Cold Snap), [Impale](kinetic-talent:Impale), [Pillar](kinetic-talent:Pillar), [Torrent](kinetic-talent:Torrent), [Water Manipulator](kinetic-talent:Water Manipulator), [Waterdancer](kinetic-talent:Waterdancer)
**4th** - [Healing Burst](kinetic-talent:Healing Burst), [Ice Sculptor](kinetic-talent:Ice Sculptor), [Spray](kinetic-talent:Spray), [Watersense](kinetic-talent:Watersense)
**5th** - [Waterdancer, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Waterdancer), [Watersense, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Watersense)
**6th** - [Ice Path](kinetic-talent:Ice Path), [Kinetic Revivification](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Revivification), [Suffocate](kinetic-talent:Suffocate)
**7th** - [Cloud](kinetic-talent:Cloud), [Fragmentation](kinetic-talent:Fragmentation)
**8th** - [Cryokinetic Stasis](kinetic-talent:Cryokinetic Stasis), [Maelstrom](kinetic-talent:Maelstrom)
**9th** - [Tidal Wave](kinetic-talent:Tidal Wave)

name: Wood
description: Kineticists who focus on the concept of wood as an element are known as phytokineticists. Phytokineticists share a strong bond with the First World and channel the power of primordial life. As there is no "Elemental Plane of Wood," the phytokineticist draws upon pockets of vital energy that form when the Elemental Planes grind against the borders of the First World.
**Class Skills:** A phytokineticist adds Handle Animal and Knowledge (nature) to her list of class skills.
**Simple Blasts** - [Positive Blast](kinetic-talent:Positive Blast), [Wood Blast](kinetic-talent:Wood Blast)

**Composite Blasts** - [Autumn Blast](kinetic-talent:Autumn Blast), [Positive Admixture](kinetic-talent:Positive Admixture), [Spring Blast](kinetic-talent:Spring Blast), [Summer Blast](kinetic-talent:Summer Blast), [Verdant Blast](kinetic-talent:Verdant Blast), [Winter Blast](kinetic-talent:Winter Blast)
**Defense** - [Flesh of Wood](kinetic-talent:Flesh of Wood)

**1st** - [Basic Phytokinesis](kinetic-talent:Basic Phytokinesis), [Dazzling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Dazzling Infusion), [Kinetic Cover](kinetic-talent:Kinetic Cover), [Photokinetic Infusion](kinetic-talent:Photokinetic Infusion), [Pushing Infusion](kinetic-talent:Pushing Infusion), [Roots](kinetic-talent:Roots), [Wood Healer](kinetic-talent:Wood Healer), [Woodland Step](kinetic-talent:Woodland Step)

**2nd** - [Angelic Protection](kinetic-talent:Angelic Protection), [Entangling Infusion](kinetic-talent:Entangling Infusion), [Foxfire](kinetic-talent:Foxfire), [Merciful Foliage](kinetic-talent:Merciful Foliage)

**3rd** - [Brachiation](kinetic-talent:Brachiation), [Foxfire Infusion](kinetic-talent:Foxfire Infusion), [Impale](kinetic-talent:Impale), [Pillar](kinetic-talent:Pillar), [Thorn Flesh](kinetic-talent:Thorn Flesh), [Warp Wood](kinetic-talent:Warp Wood)

**4th** - [Greensight](kinetic-talent:Greensight), [Healing Burst](kinetic-talent:Healing Burst), [Herbal Antivenom](kinetic-talent:Herbal Antivenom), [Plant Disguise](kinetic-talent:Plant Disguise), [Shape Wood](kinetic-talent:Shape Wood), [Toxic Infusion](kinetic-talent:Toxic Infusion), [Turning Blast](kinetic-talent:Turning Blast)
**5th** - [Woodland Step, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Woodland Step)
**6th** - [Deadly Earth](kinetic-talent:Deadly Earth), [Green Tongue](kinetic-talent:Green Tongue)
**7th** - [Green Tongue, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Green Tongue), [Toxic Infusion, Greater](kinetic-talent:Greater Toxic Infusion), [Tree Step](kinetic-talent:Tree Step)
**8th** - [Wood Soldiers](kinetic-talent:Wood Soldiers)
**9th** - [Forest Siege](kinetic-talent:Forest Siege)
